beforeNormalization: {"id":"lesson-egy-beg-001","title":{"arabic":"أهلاً بيك في مصر","english":"Welcome to Egypt: Basic Greetings","transliteration":"Ahlan beek fe Masr"},"level":"beginner","description":{"english":"Learn the absolute essentials of Egyptian Arabic: how to say hello, introduce yourself, ask 'how are you', and say goodbye naturally.","arabic":"تعلم أساسيات العامية المصرية: إزاي تسلم، تعرف نفسك، تسأل عن الحال، وتقول مع السلامة بشكل طبيعي."},"learningObjectives":["Greet people at different times of the day","Ask someone how they are doing","Introduce yourself and ask for someone's name","Say goodbye in a polite way"],"estimatedDuration":20,"prerequisites":[],"subLessons":[{"id":"sub-01-greetings","title":{"arabic":"السلام والتحية","english":"Greetings and Checking In","transliteration":"El Salam we el Taheya"},"content":{"title":{"arabic":"كلمات التحية الأساسية","english":"Basic Greeting Words","transliteration":"Kalemat el taheya el asaseya"},"phrases":[{"arabic":"أهلاً","english":"Hello / Welcome","transliteration":"Ahlan"},{"arabic":"إزيك؟","english":"How are you? (to a male)","transliteration":"Ezzayak?"},{"arabic":"إزيك؟","english":"How are you? (to a female)","transliteration":"Ezzayek?"},{"arabic":"كويس","english":"Good (male speaker)","transliteration":"Kwayyes"},{"arabic":"كويسة","english":"Good (female speaker)","transliteration":"Kwayyesa"},{"arabic":"الحمد لله","english":"Thank God (Standard reply to 'How are you')","transliteration":"El hamdu lellah"},{"arabic":"كله تمام","english":"Everything is great / All good","transliteration":"Kollo tamam"}],"explanations":[{"english":"In Egyptian Arabic, distinction between talking to a male or female is very important.
